Question
========

For two independent events A and B, P(A) = 0.4 and P(B)
= 0.3. Then the probability of A or B is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.82
* 0.70
* 0.58

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.82: Incorrect
* 0.70: Incorrect
* 0.58: Correct
